item.title: Union Square Cafe
item.description: Today, I had lunch at one of my favorite spots, Union Square Cafe. Beforehand, I walked past the New York City Columbus Day Parade, and took a few photos. union square cafe a marching band at the parade a float getting ready for the parade

item.title: A day in Manhattan
item.description: Today, I had brunch at Momofuku Ss채m Bar with some friends, walked down to Soho to the REI store to buy a new jacket for my travels, and then I walked home across the Williamsburg Bridge. espresso from saltwater the bar at momofuku ss채m bar ham & bacon cornbread & burrata, with benton’s ham & bacon and pickled chilis, from momofuku ss채m bar brunch at momofuku ss채m bar
